definition: surname Li/abbr. for 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4], Classic of Rites

sentences.english: In ancient times it was etiquette to present your full-size visiting card when giving someone a gift.
sentences.chinese: 古時候，送禮物時附上自己的名帖，是一種禮儀。

sentences.english: He bought her a gift at the duty-free shop.
sentences.chinese: 他在免稅商店裏給她買了份禮物。

sentences.english: And a piranha 's a fish, just like your present.
sentences.chinese: 食人魚也是一種魚，就像你的生日禮物一樣。

sentences.english: They went to my home on time and brough gifts to me .
sentences.chinese: 他們去我的家在時間和布拉夫禮物給我。

sentences.english: Shawn boomed. "There is endless bounty there for both of us.
sentences.chinese: 肖恩低聲說，“那兒會給我們倆無盡的禮物。

sentences.english: The gift can be something made or bought from a gift shop.
sentences.chinese: 能很輕鬆的禮物或買一家禮品店。

sentences.english: Valentine's Day gifts available for sale at Praline.
sentences.chinese: 特製情人節精美禮物，精點坊有售。

sentences.english: This little present is for you as a token of our love. We hope you can use it.
sentences.chinese: 送你這個小禮物，聊表我心意，希望你能用得上。

sentences.english: Tokens in cash or kind to staff are prohibited.
sentences.chinese: 同敬懷仁院禁止所有工作人員接受任何現金或禮物。

sentences.english: Leons birthday is coming soon, hao beauty attentively to prepare gifts for Leon.
sentences.chinese: 李昂生日快到了，郝麗人用心準備給李昂的禮物。

sentences.english: Exchanging little gifts they ve made for each other.
sentences.chinese: 他們彼此交換着親手做的小禮物。

sentences.english: I wanted mother's present to be secret, but my sister let the cat out of the bag.
sentences.chinese: 給母親的禮物我原想保密的，可是妹妹卻露了馬腳。

sentences.english: When her mother insisted she had to get something, Clarissa asked for socks.
sentences.chinese: 當她媽媽堅持讓她選件禮物時，她要了襪子。

sentences.english: The magister has been kind enough to provide us with suitable gifts.
sentences.chinese: 總督已經很慷慨的爲我們準備了合適的禮物了。

sentences.english: The two friends gave presents to each other on their birthdays.
sentences.chinese: 兩個朋友在生日時互贈禮物。

sentences.english: This was given us as a present on the occasion of our silver wedding.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們銀婚紀念時，收到的禮物。

definition: to send/to give as a present
money wrapped in red as a gift/bonus payment/kickback/bribe
to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)
